string-array.name: text
string-array.item: Nokia Oyj is a Finnish communications and information technology multinational corporation that is headquartered in Espoo, Uusimaa.
Samsung Group is a South Korean multinational conglomerate company headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul
Sony Mobile Communications AB is a multinational mobile phone manufacturing company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan, and Lund, Sweden, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Sony Corporation.
Reliance Communications Ltd. is an Indian Internet access and telecommunications company headquartered in Navi Mumbai, India.
BlackBerry Limited, formerly known as Research In Motion Limited, is a Canadian telecommunication and wireless equipment company best known to the general public as the developer of the BlackBerry.
Apple Inc. is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics.
LG Electronics Inc. is a South Korean multinational electronics company headquartered in Yeouido-dong, Seoul, and a member of the LG chaebol.
Motorola Mobility makes Android smartphones and Bluetooth accessories to keep people connected.
